pgrid.core
Class RoutingTable

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      pgrid.core.RoutingTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLRoutingTable
public class RoutingTable
extends DefaultHandler

This class represents the Routing Table of the P-Grid facility. It includes the fidget hosts, the hosts for each level of a path, and the replicas.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt

Method Detail

refresh

public void refresh(RoutingTable routingTable,
                    int commonLen,
                    int lLen,
                    int rLen,
                    int maxFidgets,
                    int maxRef)
Refreshes the routing table by building the union with the given routing table.

Parameters:
routingTable - the routing table used to refresh this routing table.
commonLen - the common length of the peer's path.
lLen - the local path length.
rLen - the remote path length.
maxFidgets - the amount of fidgets to manage.
maxRef - the amount of references to manage per level.
